channel.title: The BP World Fuck
channel.description:
So how bad has BP fucked the world with this oil spill?
Or, perhaps with all the inevitable suits against them, how badly has BP fucked themselves?

item.title: The BP World Fuck
item.dc:creator: mattemuse
item.description:
Before rig explosion, BP pumped chemical mixture into well, contractor says

In the hours before the Deepwater Horizon drilling rig exploded, BP pumped into the well an extraordinarily large quantity of an unusual chemical mixture, a contractor on the rig testified Monday.

BP had hundreds of barrels of the two chemicals on hand and needed to dispose of the material, Lindner testified. By first flushing it into the well, the company could take advantage of an exemption in an environmental law that otherwise would have prohibited it from discharging the hazardous waste into the Gulf of Mexico, Lindner said.

The procedure mixed two substances. “It’s not something we’ve ever done before,” Lindner said.

https://www.washingtonpost.com/wp-dyn/content/article/2010/07/20/AR2010072002038.html

Read full topic

item.title: The BP World Fuck
item.dc:creator: Comrade_Tiki
item.description:
sersoft:

At least you’re still alive…

Objection!!!

Argumentum ad ignorantiam. I happen to know that many absentee witnesses exist who have been prevented by corporeal matters of testifying against your placating remarks. You know full well of this, and yet you continue to create a message of blind optimism that can only be heard by its applicable demographic, the biased jury of the living, without even considering the opinions of those who only once were, and those that may never be.

Read full topic

item.title: The BP World Fuck
item.dc:creator: DansonDelta40
item.description:
sersoft:

…I have passed the mental stage where DansonDelta currently is and realized I’d rather be myself than anyone else on this planet, the human body and mind is made of technology and epic win, regardless of it being aesthetically appealing to anyone.

Well, if you are suffering life-long consequences from a mild, however very obvious form of fetal alcohol syndrome (my mother didn’t notice she was pregnant until it became obvious, and thus continued to go to parties with my dad for several weeks or even months during my embrionic/fetal stage), you won’t find your own body to be made of as epic win and technology as those of almost everybody else. It is like going to a LAN Party with a Mac, or like owning a PS2 while everybody else plays PS3.

And being bound to never play anything better in your whole life. Which, by the way, might just happen to end on your 40th or 50th birthday or shortly after.

So forgive me if I sound a little depressed and self-loathing sometimes.

Yeah, I know what you will say now: “Get over it and grow some balls.”
That’s why I love this forum. There is no sign of pity anywhere around here. I am sick of it anyway.

Back to topic now! (and sorry for interrupting)

Read full topic
